articles.content: Shane Watson has retired from all forms of cricket after his latest stint in the Indian Premier League came to an end. The 39-year-old former Australia vice-captain announced that his 20-season profe… [+1527 chars]

articles.title: Firmino should be afraid: Jota deserves to take centre stage against Man City after passing Atalanta audition - Goal.com
articles.description: Geoffrey Kondogbia has sent an emotional farewell message to Valencia after joining La Liga rivals Atletico Madrid.
